name: dental-appointment-management
description: Sistema de gestión de citas odontológicas

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:clean: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist
scripts.build:copy: if exist public (xcopy public dist\public /E /I /Y) && if exist src (xcopy src dist\src /E /I /Y) && copy package.json dist\ /Y && copy package-lock.json dist\ /Y && copy server.js dist\ /Y
scripts.build:simple: mkdir dist 2>nul & copy package.json dist\ & copy package-lock.json dist\ & copy server.js dist\

author: Pablo Maldonado
